page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES,ANNAN
page.content: These are some of the school playground games that girls play: { HOPSCOTCH SKIPPING {Hopscotch}is a game for 1to4 players.Boxes numbered 1to 9 are drawn on the playground.The player throws a stone into box 1 then hops into box 2, scotches(jumps)into box 3 and so on to box 9. The player starts again and throws the stone into box 2.She continues until she either stands on a line or the stone lands on a line-then another player takes a turn.If you reach box 9 without a mistake,you write your name in a box. {Skipping }is played with two people turning a rope round and round.Other girls jump in and skip in time with the turning rope.Rhymes are sung in time with the skipping.Eg.: I like coffee,I like tea I like Lynn in with me....
